name: Becoming Omega
description:
Becoming Ω (Omega) is an Open World Multiplayer Action RPG where only the strong can prevail.
In Becoming Ω your Ultimate Goal is to ascend from a mere human into an Eldritch Dark God and reign over lesser Deities.
Fast Paced Fights and Flying Combat, Discover Ancient Mana Temples to learn the unique Divine Elements,
Hunt GODS alone or with your assembled pantheon, Create your own kingdom from the ground up as you start your journey to BECOME OMEGA!
For a list of game mechanics check below.
- Create your character
- Fluid Fast paced combat with combos chaining to fighting in the air
- Complete control over your characters flight (fly above the clouds if you want)
- Fully volumetric Weather system
- Devastating Magic Ultimate spells and fast spell combo chains
- Gain the ability to learn more elements per god rank (Enoken, Awoken, Minor God, Major God, Old God, and Eldritch Dark God
- Multiple massive islands make up the world of zavos
- Play online and create a guild with your friends in the form of pantheons
- anything you can do offline you can do online
- Npcs roam the world freely fighting bosses and becoming stronger as well
- Building system with ownership of your building
- Use your Magic and sword while flying to fight enemies in the sky
- no traditional leveling system get stronger by exploring (E.g. Running increase agility which gives xp to agility and overall level)
- Status effects on enemys
- Use divine elements such as Fire, Death, Creation, Space, Etc..
- Explore freely from the start of the game
- Short main quest line to get you in the world while procedurally generated side quests push you to your ultimate goal
- Pvp, Pve
- Fully modular armor which allow you to equip 11 different main armor pieces at once making for thousands of combinations
- Procedurally generated weapons and item rarity
- Divine Rebirth system to where if you die as a god against another god you lose stats and may lose your god rank.
- Boss Ai, Npc Villagers who can tell you rumors where to discover magic or bosses, God Ai which have the same functionality as the player will pickup loot hunt gods and learn new magic independent of what the player is doing and will make their own choices on who to fight and who to spare.
- The other gameplay mechanics are based on lore in the game world so I will not describe them here you have to play to find the rest!
